body: Desert Girl on Kuwait draws our attention to police torture in this post. "My heart goes out to the families of the victims.  Imagine being a mother and reading about how this happened to your child? In their own country," she writes.
original_body: Desert Girl on Kuwait draws our attention to police torture in this post. "My heart goes out to the families of the victims. Imagine being a mother and reading about how this happened to your child? In their own country," she writes.
title: Kuwait: MPs Expose More Police Torture
